bites.bite: The largest adm_1 is Shan State with 18 reports followed by Kachin State with 12 reports.
The largest adm_2 is with 9 reports followed by Muse District with 8 reports.
The largest adm_1 is Shan State with 749 reports followed by Kayin State with 486 reports.
The largest adm_2 is with 1120 reports followed by Loilen District with 236 reports.
The largest adm_1 is Shan State with 18 reports followed by Kachin State with 12 reports.
